MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Cronton, affecting properties in Pex Hill Avenue and surrounding streets. Repairs on a faulty transformer are taking longer than expected and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.35am on October 17, 2020.
